description.black-white:
The user creates a bizarre area
in which Pokémon’s held items
lose their effects for five turns.

effect.full: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.
effect.shortEffect: Negates held items for five turns.
